rules.dateTimeSystem: Date/time is saved to memory. Do not ask again. Current: 2025-12-17 Morning EST
rules.commandExecution: CRITICAL: When user mentions a command (like --morning, --quick, --full, --garvis), EXECUTE IT IMMEDIATELY. Do not ask for permission or research first - just execute. This is standard behavior expected in all projects.
rules.garvisSystem: Garvis (BallCODE Fully Integrated System) - Like Iron Man's Jarvis. When user says 'Garvis:', 'SIAFI:', or '--garvis', immediately parse request, acknowledge, and START WORKING. No confirmation needed. Complete everything autonomously. Only ask questions if unclear or blocking.
rules.freezeRule: No pushes/updates to BallCODE Unity workflow while validating the new workflow
rules.n8nImportOutcomes: WORKFLOW IMPORT HAS 3 OUTCOMES: (1) Nothing happens (no error, no workflow). (2) Error message pops up. (3) Workflow successfully imports. If (1) happens, assume the JSON shape/fields are not accepted and switch to a UI-IMPORT-CLEAN version (minimal keys) or a known-good older workflow file.
rules.n8nImportDebugProtocol: If import outcome is (1) silent: (a) ensure workflow JSON is a single object (not an array), (b) remove metadata fields (id/createdAt/updatedAt/isArchived/etc.), (c) ensure IF nodes use conditions.boolean format for typeVersion 1, (d) retry import, (e) if still silent, import a known-good older file (N8N-1.123.5-IMPORTABLE) and/or confirm you are viewing the correct n8n instance/project.
rules.blockerResolution: For any blockers: research (AIMCODE) → implement smallest safe fix → verify end-to-end → only then ship
rules.endToEndTesting: After every change, verify: book link → return handling → unlock behavior
rules.oneThingEnforcement: CRITICAL: Before EVERY action, check if it's within the ONE THING. If not, flag it and propose deferring.
rules.readyToUseWorkflows: FULL INTEGRATION WORKFLOW (n8n-ballcode-full-integration-workflow.json) and SCREENSHOT-TO-FIX WORKFLOW (n8n-screenshot-to-fix-workflow.json) are READY TO GO. Use them when it makes sense. Full Integration: AI-driven development automation for multi-system updates. Screenshot-to-Fix: Visual debugging and auto-repair. Both are production-ready and can be imported/activated when needed. Other workflows (Phase 2, Python Hybrid) will be running soon.

overallGoal.description: Create and launch 7 dribble-level books (Levels 1-7) with functional paywall system
overallGoal.notes: We’re prioritizing loop closure and safe automation first.
